titleStmt.title: Essaies vpon the fiue senses with a pithie one vpon detraction. Continued vvith sundry Christian resolues, full of passion and deuotion, purposely composed for the zealously-disposed. By Rich: Brathwayt Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E: G[riffin]: for Richard Whittaker, and are to be sold at his shop at the Kings head in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of verse and errata.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
